column1: Little Goat Diner////We went on a Monday
column2: which also happened to be President's Day (and my 30th birthday
column3: bam!) which meant the wait was 45-60 minutes. Oof. So
column4: we got our name on the list and went to Haymarket for a beer while we waited. 55 minutes and two brews later
column5: we were seated at the end of the (only?) communal table with a family and their two kids (who stared at us the entire meal.)
